amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funding for negotiations toward renewing the US-China Science and Technology Cooperation Protocol.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A036) Agreed to by voice vote.
